Data Source: whale-coin@localhost Database: whale-coin Schema: public Table: coins
-- auto-generated definition
create table coins
(
    id   serial     not null,
    coin varchar(5) not null
        constraint coins_pkey
            primary key
);

alter table coins
    owner to anton;
  Connection failed: java.lang.RuntimeException: [08001] Connection to localhost:5432 refused. Check that the hostname and port are correct and that the postmaster is accepting TCP/IP connections. java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused (Connection refused).


  Data Source: whale-coin@localhost Database: whale-coin Schema: public Table: whale_message
  -- auto-generated definition
  create table whale_message
  (
      id           serial not null
          constraint whale_message_pkey
              primary key,
      time         timestamp,
      coin         text
          constraint whale_message_coin_fkey
              references coins,
      amount       integer,
      amount_usd   integer,
      full_message text
  );

  alter table whale_message
      owner to anton;
    Connection failed: java.lang.RuntimeException: [08001] Connection to localhost:5432 refused. Check that the hostname and port are correct and that the postmaster is accepting TCP/IP connections. java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused (Connection refused).
